title: Ingersoll Rand 2235TiMAX-R 1/2” Drive Air Impact Wrench, Lightweight 4.6 lb Design, Powerful Torque Output Up to 1,350 ft/lbs, Titanium Hammer Case, Max Control, Hi-Visibility Red
features: MAX VISIBILITY: The new 2235TiMAX-G (green) has a high visibility design that allows you to spot the tool quickly on any job, auto garage, or construction site, while customizing your toolbox
MAX POWER: Punish the toughest bolts with up to 1350 ft-lbs of torque output powered by Ingersoll Rand’s finely tuned twin-hammer impact mechanism

MAX CONTROL: Using the 4 position power regulator, you can seamlessly switch between power modes and adjust torque output for each task; One-handed forward/reverse mechanism lets you change direction with a simple button push
MAX COMFORT: This model impact wrench is compact and light; Weighing only 4.6 lbs, it offers the best power to weight ratio in its class and minimizes hand fatigue so you can work harder and faster

MAX DURABILITY: Titanium hammer case and steel wear plate protect the tool from the harsh environments and can withstand repeated drops; Every component, mechanism, and function has undergone rigorous testing to ensure long-lasting performance
description: Featuring the best power-to-weight ratio of any impact wrench on the market, the Ingersoll Rand 2235TiMAX-R 1/2-Inch Drive Air Impact Wrench is built to tackle the toughest bolts while standing out with its high visibility red color. This powerful, durable impact wrench packs up to 1,350 foot-pounds of nut busting torque into a compact and lightweight design. Weighing only 4.6 pounds, it allows you to work for longer stretches of time with less user fatigue. The four-position power regulator and one-handed forward & reverse push button give you the control and versatility needed to tackle a variety of automotive and industrial jobs. And thanks to its titanium hammer case and rugged composite housing, this impact wrench is tough enough to endure the harshest working environments--from garages to demanding industrial job sites. Every component, mechanism, and function has undergone rigorous testing to ensure its premium performance and this tool is backed by a two-year warranty.
